entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries or rain showers. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries and rain showers beginning this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries and rain showers ending this evening then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
